headline: What Honeywell International (HON)'s Digital Security Push Means for Its Retail Technology Edge
summary: Digimarc Corporation recently announced a collaboration with Honeywell International to combat the growing problem of gift card fraud by integrating advanced digital security into Honeywell's handheld retail scanners. This initiative addresses a very large global fraud problem and positions Honeywell as an early innovator in automated fraud detection technology for retailers, with a full rollout expected by early 2026. We'll assess how Honeywell's adoption of automated gift card fraud...
